sinama saha rupawahini thira rachana kalawa pilibanda dina dekaka wadamuluwak nomile pawathwimata shri lanka rupawahini abhyasa aayathanaya katayuthu yoda atha.19 saha 20 dina waladi perawaru 9.00 sita paswaru 4.00 dakwa pawathwena mema wadamuluwata sinama saha rupawahini thira rachana kalawa hadarimata kamathi oonama ayekuta sahabhagi wimata ida prasthawa atha.wisheshayen sinamawa saha rupawahini madhya wishayayak lesa hadarana wishwawidyala sisunata saha ema kshethrayanhi katayuthu karana aadhunikayan aramunu kotagena pawathwena me wadamuluwa sandaha sampath dayakathwaya sapayanne prawina shrawya drushya madhyawediyaku nema sinama saha rupawahini adhyakshakawarayaku thirarachana shilpiyaku wana bartram nihal wisini.mehidi sankalpa wardhanaya, saundaryaya saha thirarachana kalawa, thirarachana widhi saha thakshanika pitapath rachana aadi wishaya karunu osse wadamuluwa pawathew.
